data.title: Bay Street Theater
data.text:
Tomike Ogugua

Tomike Ogugua (Cassio, actor) is a Nigerian American Actor, Producer, and Model based in NYC. BFA: Acting; North Carolina A&T State University (Irene Ryan Acting Scholarship Region IV Nominee). Off Broadway: “Henry IV” (Donmar/St Ann’s Warehouse), “Julius Caesar” (Royal Shakespeare Company/Brooklyn Academy of Music). NYC Theatre: “Savannah Black & Blue” (Negro Ensemble Company), “Walter’s Dead” (NY Theatre Festival), “Off Track” (NY Fringe), “To Damascus Part II”(Strindberg Rep), “Julius Caesar Set In Africa” (Nuyorican Poets), “Fortune”, “Sons Of Johnny Johnson” (Midtown Int’l Theatre Fest), “Oshun” (National Black Theatre), “Revolution’s Smite” (New Perspectives Theatre), “48 Hours In Harlem”, “48 Hours In El Bronx”(Harlem 9), “Radio Golf” (American Theatre of Actors).Regional/Chicago: “Seven Guitars” (Congo Square), “Young Playwrights Festival” (Pegasus Players), “R&J” (Connecticut Free Shakes), “Flyin’ West”(Thymely Theatre), “Body & Sold” (CAASE). Television: Currently Recurs as Marshal Macedon on Starz highest rated show “Power”; Season 6 began 8/25/19. Other TV credits include: “Blue Bloods”, “I Love You But I Lied”, “Redrum”, “Fatal Encounters”, and others. Film: “Caviar “(2019), “The Tested”, “Samaria”, “See You Next Tuesday”, “Driving Force”, “Voice Of Reason” (BEST ACTOR-Short Film Drama/Fantasy at 2018 Downbeach Film Festival), “Ibrahim”. IG: tomikeog

Enjoy the Show.
